topic.title: Influenza Signs And Symptoms Observation - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to PHCR Signs And Symptoms Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.53)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.3240 PHVS_SignsSymptoms_Flu DYNAMIC, where its data type is CD (CONF:1867)
SHALL conform to PHCR Signs And Symptoms Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.53)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1861)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1862)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:1864)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1865)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1866)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.3240 PHVS_SignsSymptoms_Flu DYNAMIC, where its data type is CD (CONF:1867)

PHCR Case Observation SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1887, CONF:1888, CONF:1890), such that Contains @typeCode="MFST" MFST (is manifestation of), such that Contains @inversionInd="true", and Contains exactly one [1..1] Signs And Symptoms Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.53) (CONF:1889)
